body: I have a question. I saw a guy yesterday using an alt and spleefingspleefing it for KD is this legal?
body_tagged: I have a question. I saw a guy yesterday using an alt and spleefingspleefing it for KD is this legal?
title: Using Alts to boost KD

replies.body:
Yes, it's abusing. Look for my last infraction, then you know what I mean (I used tons of alts XDDDDD)

EDIT: I mean no, of course. It's ILLEGAL* not legal xD
